title: Dex - The Soldier of Yesterday

embed.description: Not sure if I qualify to enter, as I am from OCE, but this is my October CCOS entry. Not hoping for much with this. BACKSTORY + IDENTIFICATION Name: Dex Title: The Soldier of Yesterday Lore: Dex used to live a happy, peaceful life.

body: This has been getting some views over on the NA boards, and was mentioned in a [podcast](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U5PHVVwpekA) earlier this month. Go check it out if you want to, now that boards exists we can all do stuff on all of the servers' boards.
